## Sequences

If auto number generated by database is used in more than one table, sequences will be more useful.
Sequences are database objects from which users may generate unique integers.


- [oracle sequences](https://docs.oracle.com/en/database/oracle/oracle-database/21/sqlrf/CREATE-SEQUENCE.html)
- [Sql server sequences](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/statements/create-sequence-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver16)
